name: Conway's Game of Life on TIC-80
name_original: Conway's Game of Life on TIC-80
description:
Conway's Game of Life

This is just an implementation of Conway's Game of Life on the TIC-80 fantasy computer. I tried to add some features to make exploration and experimenting easier. It's a little quiet, though, so I may try to add ambient music sometime.

You can find the Lua source code on my GitHub. The .tic file is also available here if you want to run it locally.
